review: worst experience, I got a wrong item and picture clearly shows that, you didn't provide compensation, I don't you should shut down your support team , good for nothing......

Worst technical team and support team. Was one of the early adopters of Swiggy Instamart. Now there's a bug in their app and for any offer or rewards always the minimum amount in cart page shows 1999 unlike welcome offer. I have raised in help and mail. No use. Just horrible team.

It is Very High Price Of all The Products In Instamart. In Market Oil Price where 2200rs and In instamart it was around 2355 rs. And After That Delivery Charges , GST , Surge Charge . For Convience Swiggy charged around 250 extra in just one oil tin.
waste app this I'm ordering more than 10 times every one missing items in the order it's disgusting to see waste waste app this is....
Pathetic and frustrating ! Poor delivery and ETA that changes in every minute
but needs more offers to order regular

worst app don't buy any thing from Instamart.. they always send expired and cheap quality products.. if we are trying to convey the issue they won't respond properly.. even they won't take back the their products also.. I have ordered konjac rice they sent expired rice i have raised complaint against it.. but they are simply saying it has shelf life so we won't take back.. they hide expiry date with some other stickers. even I have updated pics and videos too.. they are simply saying we won't

Swiggy should improve its app features. I was just checking fee difference between different payment methods and as i clicked COD order placed, you can confirm at leastonce after that. More than that when i cancelled within 1 sec they denied and no option for call. Now keep sending delivery no when is at the address and i will not order again via swiggy.
I am having difficulty understanding why a 1km delivery would require a minimum of 30 minutes,My experience was not satisfactory.
